hero.subtitle: A modern FastAPI framework for building multi-tenant SaaS applications with enterprise-grade features out of the box.

author.name: Apex Neural Team
author.bio: Building the next generation of AI-native development tools.

overview.text: Apex SaaS Framework is a comprehensive FastAPI boilerplate designed to eliminate the repetitive setup work required for modern SaaS applications. It provides a robust foundation with pre-configured authentication, multi-tenancy, and payment integration, allowing developers to focus purely on business logic.

architecture.description: The framework follows a strict Clean Architecture pattern, ensuring separation of concerns and long-term maintainability. It leverages FastAPI for the interface layer, SQLAlchemy 2.0 for the persistence layer, and a domain-centric core that isolates business rules from external frameworks.
architecture.diagramCaption: Apex SaaS Framework - Clean Architecture Overview

components.name: API Layer
components.desc: FastAPI routers and Pydantic schemas handling HTTP requests.

components.name: Domain Layer
components.desc: Pure Python business logic, services, and repository interfaces.

components.name: Infrastructure
components.desc: Concrete implementations for Database, Email, and Storage adapters.

components.name: Core Security
components.desc: Centralized authentication, RBAC, and configuration management.

proTip.title: Extensibility First
proTip.text: Apex allows you to extend base models using standard SQLAlchemy inheritance. Simply subclass User or Organization to add custom fields without touching the core framework code.

workflow.description: The developer workflow is streamlined for speed. Starting with a single command, developers get a fully functional backend. The framework handles the complexities of tenant isolation and user management automatically via dependency injection.
workflow.caption: From Initialization to Production Deployment
